description: Try our easy to follow Sausage & Lentil Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Sausage,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Sausage & Lentil Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep saucepan over medium heat. Add sausages and cook, turning, for 8 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Add onion and curry powder to pan and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until onion is soft. Add lentils, pasta sauce and 6 cups water and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes or until lentils are soft.
Slice sausages. Return to pan and cook for 2 minutes or until heated through. Add spinach and cook for 1 minute or until just wilted. Serve soup with bread rolls.
